title: [LFT] P4 Top/Sup mainly paly tanks (clash)
body:
Just an average plat 4 player looking for a clash team, i can flex into top or support but will play tanks mostly 
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body: Digital Fury Gaming is currently looking for a plat+ support to fill our  roster, and wanted to know if you wanted in. if so, feel free to add me in game at shouri
